introduction: SYNOPSISJi-na is the daughter of a businessman living abroad. She returns to Korea to go to college. At a college festival, Ji-na meets a guy named Je-kal Su-jan and he takes her chastity. Afterwards, she falls into a degraded lifestyle. Then Ji-na meets a Chinese friend named Jin Mu-hwa and starts a new life. Je-kal Su-jan commits a crime and is put in jail. When she goes to Seoul, Ji-na meets Mu-hwa's brother, Jin Chawu-pyung, an international pianist who happens to be in Seoul. Ji-na realizes that Chawu-pyung is the man that she has been dreaming and she falls deeply in love with him. At this time, Je-kal Su-jan reappears in front of Ji-na and torments her again. So she ends up killing him.故事通过大学返回到女儿学习外国居民客商会见苏珊·杰加尔房子是在节日知道中国朋友叫谁堕落的生活神武愤怒失去自己的处女给了他之后，开始新的生活。然后，当Jeegal Susan因犯罪而入狱时，Jinny上了首尔。通过与在首尔全球钢琴家金牧周二将深深地喜欢落在她的兄弟吉恩杂烩评估遇到的完成，他意识到，他总是做梦李Sanghyeong人。此时，Jeegal Susan出现并开始打扰Gina，最终杀死Jeegal Susan。
